as.description: The element or component the Switch should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Switch should render as.

defaultChecked.description: The default checked value when using as an uncontrolled component.
defaultChecked.description_zh: The default checked value when using as an uncontrolled component.

onChange.description: The function to call when the switch is toggled.
onChange.description_zh: The function to call when the switch is toggled.

name.description: The name used when using this component inside a form.
name.description_zh: The name used when using this component inside a form.

value.description: The value used when using this component inside a form, if it is checked.
value.description_zh: The value used when using this component inside a form, if it is checked.

:checked.description: Whether or not the switch is checked.
:checked.description_zh: Whether or not the switch is checked.
